item.title: Decline in fertility rates in 2013 compared with 1960
population changes for different combinations of Region and IncomeGroup
item.description: population changes for different combinations of Region and IncomeGroup For different combinations of Region and IncomeGroup, the population changes in 1960,1985 and 2013.
